items.title: Pakistan suspends visas for Indians after deadly Kashmir attack on tourists
items.description: It comes after Delhi's retaliatory measures following a militant attack in Indian-administered Kashmir that killed 26 tourists.

items.title: Trump says he is 'not happy' with deadly Russian strikes on Kyiv
items.description: The overnight strikes killed at least eight people and injured 77 more, local officials have said.

items.title: Could this be the end of the road for Tanzania's great survivor?
items.description: Tundu Lissu has survived against the political odds over the years but has now been charged with treason.

items.title: South Africa and Ukraine woo each other - as relationships with Trump turn sour
items.description: Volodymyr Zelensky ends an historic visit to South Africa to counter Russia's influence on the continent.

items.title: Benin admits that 54 soldiers killed in attack by al-Qaeda group
items.description: This is the deadliest known attack since insurgents began operating in Benin at the beginning of the decade.
